title: How to Change Your Password in Windows 8

steps.title: Swipe in from the right side of your Windows 8 screen, then tap on “Settings.
steps.content: Swipe in from the right side of your Windows 8 screen, then tap on “Settings. ” If using a mouse, point to the lower-right corner of your screen, move the mouse pointer up, then click on “Settings.”

steps.title: Click or tap on “Change PC settings,” then select “Accounts.
steps.content: Click or tap on “Change PC settings,” then select “Accounts. ”

steps.title: Select “Sign-in options,” then click or tap on “Change” under the Password section.
steps.content: Select “Sign-in options,” then click or tap on “Change” under the Password section. This will open the “change your password” window.

steps.title: Type your current password into the “Old password” field.
steps.content: Type your current password into the “Old password” field.

steps.title: Enter your new password into the fields displayed on-screen, then click or tap on “Next.
steps.content: Enter your new password into the fields displayed on-screen, then click or tap on “Next. ”

steps.title: Click on “Finish” when Windows 8 informs you the password has been successfully changed.
steps.content: Click on “Finish” when Windows 8 informs you the password has been successfully changed. Your Windows 8 password is now updated. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Press “Control” + “Alt” + “Delete,” then select “Change a password.
steps.content: Press “Control” + “Alt” + “Delete,” then select “Change a password. ” If using a Windows 8 tablet, press and hold the Windows button, then press the Power button, then select “Change a password.”

steps.title: Type your current password into the “Old password” field.
steps.content: Type your current password into the “Old password” field.

steps.title: Enter your new password into the fields displayed on-screen, then click or tap on “Next.
steps.content: Enter your new password into the fields displayed on-screen, then click or tap on “Next. ”

steps.title: Click on “Finish” when Windows 8 informs you the password has been successfully changed.
steps.content: Click on “Finish” when Windows 8 informs you the password has been successfully changed. Your Windows 8 password is now updated. [2] X Research source
